Class Database

  • java.lang.Object
    • groupproject.Database

  • public class Database
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles database connections and transactions

      • DBConnect

        public java.sql.ResultSet DBConnect(java.lang.String query)
                             throws java.sql.SQLException,
                                    java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Connects to the database and returns the ResultSet for the specified query
        Parameters:
        query - the sql query string
        Returns:
        the ResultSet from the transaction
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - happens when there is an error with the query string
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - happens when the program can't find the ojdbc6.jar library

      • isUser

        public boolean isUser(java.lang.String username)
               throws java.sql.SQLException,
                      java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Tests if the username is currently in the database
        Parameters:
        username - the username to test
        Returns:
        true if it is, false if otherwise
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - happens when there is an error with the sql string
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - happens when the program can't find the ojdbc6.jar library

      • isAutheticated

        public boolean isAutheticated(java.lang.String username,
                     java.lang.String password)
                       throws java.sql.SQLException,
                              java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Tests if the password matches the username in the database
        Parameters:
        username - the username to match against the password
        password - the password to match against the username
        Returns:
        true if the username and password are correct, false if otherwise
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - happens when there is an error with the sql string
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - happens when the program can't find the ojdbc6.jar library
